QAPair.Question: What is (are) Migraine - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on migraines : American Headache Society -- americanheadachesociety.org/ , American Migraine Foundation -- americanmigrainefoundation.org , National Headache Foundation -- headaches.org , National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke -- www.ninds.nih.gov/Disorders/All-Disorders/Migraine-Information-Page , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/migraine.html ,
